item.title: Create a Ghost Blog using Azure Web Apps
item.description: ⚠️ This guide is outdated: Azure store account does not support this service anymore! So I’ve moved to HUGO using GitHub Pages. An easy to follow guide can be found in HUGO’s own Host on GitHub docs. Have you ever wondered how you can host your own tech-blog? If you are like me, and you’ve built countless prototypes from scratch. They all work and do what they are meant to do.
